participant_1.background:
I love fresh vegetables and fruit, especially when I can pick them myself.
my befriend is from out of town.
I want a home in a quiet area where I can focus on my art.
I would brag about my unique life story and how I managed to find success despite all the challenges I've faced.
i have a bicycle.

participant_2.background:
I prefer to keep my hair natural, as I like to focus on the food I cook.
i have a severe phobia of wide open spaces.
i hate that my mom made me get braces.
I love growing plants in my greenhouse, but I have to be careful about what I grow because of my asthma.
I now have a new most valuable possession - my library card.

content.text: Hello! I love fresh vegetables and fruits. Do you grow your own?
Hi! I do! I love growing plants in my greenhouse. I have a severe phobia of wide open spaces so the greenhouse is a great place for me to spend time with my plants.
That's so cool! I would love to have a greenhouse. I don't have a phobia but I do love the peace and quiet of a garden.
I love the peace and quiet too. It's so relaxing to just sit and watch my plants grow.
Do you grow any vegetables? I love fresh vegetables.
I grow a lot of vegetables! My favorites are tomatoes and cucumbers.
Those are both delicious! I love making salads with fresh tomatoes and cucumbers.
Me too! I also love making salsa with my fresh tomatoes.
That sounds delicious! I love salsa. I'm so jealous of your greenhouse.
You should get one! It's a lot of fun to grow your own plants.
I will definitely look into it. Thanks for the suggestion!
